name: SMILE: Chapter 2
description:
The Fire Burns Hot...

You Should Go Back To Sleep...

But...

The SMILE Wants Meat

SMILE Chapter 2 is the next chapter,  focusing on the same 13 year old boy, but this time you are lost in the forest.

This is the 2nd Chapter of the game, if you want to play the first one click this link

https://ratmen-productions.itch.io/smile

You don't have to, but we would be very thankful if you donated. The more you donate, the more motivated we get to continue development. 

Current Version: 0.0

Developers

Ares (Ratman)
